_comment: English translations for SQL Basic Course (SqlCourseSeeder)

template.title: SQL/データベース基礎コース
template.description: 初心者向けSQL/データベース完全コース。12週間でデータベースの基礎から、SQL操作、データベース設計、最適化まで実践的に学習します。

SQL/データベース基礎コース.title: SQL/Database Fundamentals Course
SQL/データベース基礎コース.description: Complete SQL/database course for beginners. Learn practically from database basics to SQL operations, database design, and optimization over 12 weeks.

SQL基礎.title: SQL/Database Fundamentals Course
SQL基礎.description: Complete SQL/database course for beginners. Learn practically from database basics to SQL operations, database design, and optimization over 12 weeks.

SQL基礎とCRUD操作.title: SQL Basics and CRUD Operations
SQL基礎とCRUD操作.description: Database concepts, table creation, basic CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
deliverables: Update and delete data with UPDATE/DELETE statements

データ取得とJOIN.title: Data Retrieval and JOIN
データ取得とJOIN.description: WHERE clause, ORDER BY, GROUP BY, aggregate functions, table joins with JOIN
deliverables: Organize data with ORDER BY and GROUP BY

高度なSQL.title: Advanced SQL
高度なSQL.description: Subqueries, CTE, window functions, transactions, indexes

データベース設計と最適化.title: Database Design and Optimization
データベース設計と最適化.description: Normalization, constraints, views, stored procedures, triggers

第1週：データベース基礎とセットアップ.title: Week 1: Database Basics and Setup
第1週：データベース基礎とセットアップ.description: Database concepts, RDBMS, MySQL installation and basic operations

データベースとは？.title: What is a Database?
データベースとは？.content: RDBMS vs NoSQL. Tables, rows, columns. Primary key, foreign key. MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite.

MySQLの基本操作.title: MySQL Basic Operations
MySQLの基本操作.content: SHOW DATABASES; CREATE DATABASE; USE; DROP. utf8mb4, collation.

第2週：テーブル作成とデータ型.title: Week 2: Table Creation and Data Types
第2週：テーブル作成とデータ型.description: CREATE TABLE, data types, constraints, INSERT statements

SQLのデータ型.title: SQL Data Types
SQLのデータ型.content: INT, DECIMAL, VARCHAR, TEXT. DATE, DATETIME, TIMESTAMP. BOOLEAN, ENUM, JSON.

テーブル作成.title: Creating Tables
テーブル作成.content: CREATE TABLE, PRIMARY KEY, AUTO_INCREMENT, NOT NULL, UNIQUE, CHECK, DEFAULT. DESCRIBE.

INSERT文 - データ挿入.title: INSERT - Data Insertion
INSERT文 - データ挿入.content: INSERT INTO ... VALUES. Multiple rows. DEFAULT, LAST_INSERT_ID().

第3週：SELECT、UPDATE、DELETE.title: Week 3: SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE
第3週：SELECT、UPDATE、DELETE.description: Basic operations for data retrieval, update, and deletion

SELECT文 - データ取得.title: SELECT - Data Retrieval
SELECT文 - データ取得.content: SELECT * / cols, AS, DISTINCT, LIMIT, OFFSET.

UPDATE文 - データ更新.title: UPDATE - Data Update
UPDATE文 - データ更新.content: UPDATE ... SET ... WHERE. Always use WHERE to avoid updating all rows.

DELETE文 - データ削除.title: DELETE - Data Deletion
DELETE文 - データ削除.content: DELETE FROM ... WHERE. TRUNCATE. Logical delete with flag.

第4週：WHERE句と条件指定.title: Week 4: WHERE Clause and Condition Specification
第4週：WHERE句と条件指定.description: WHERE clause, comparison operators, logical operators, LIKE, IN, BETWEEN

LIKE、IN、BETWEEN.title: LIKE, IN, BETWEEN
LIKE、IN、BETWEEN.content: LIKE '%x%', _; IN (list); BETWEEN a AND b. IS NULL, IS NOT NULL.

第5週：ORDER BY、GROUP BY、集計関数.title: Week 5: ORDER BY, GROUP BY, Aggregate Functions

ORDER BY - ソート.title: ORDER BY - Sorting
ORDER BY - ソート.content: ORDER BY col ASC/DESC. Multiple columns. NULL order.

集計関数.title: Aggregate Functions
集計関数.content: COUNT(*), SUM, AVG, MAX, MIN. ROUND, DISTINCT in COUNT.

GROUP BY と HAVING.title: GROUP BY and HAVING
GROUP BY と HAVING.content: GROUP BY col. HAVING filters groups. WHERE before GROUP BY, HAVING after.

第6週：JOIN（テーブル結合）.title: Week 6: JOIN (Table Joins)
第6週：JOIN（テーブル結合）.description: INNER JOIN, LEFT JOIN, RIGHT JOIN, CROSS JOIN, self-joins

JOINの種類.title: Types of JOIN
JOINの種類.content: INNER: matched only. LEFT: all left + match. RIGHT: all right + match. CROSS: all pairs.

INNER JOIN.title: INNER JOIN
INNER JOIN.content: ON condition. Table aliases. Multiple JOINs.

LEFT JOIN と RIGHT JOIN.title: LEFT and RIGHT JOIN
LEFT JOIN と RIGHT JOIN.content: LEFT keeps unmatched left rows. Find missing with WHERE right.id IS NULL.

CROSS JOIN と自己結合.title: CROSS JOIN and Self-Join
CROSS JOIN と自己結合.content: CROSS: Cartesian product. Self-join: same table with aliases, hierarchy.

サブクエリ.title: Subqueries
サブクエリ.content: Subquery in WHERE (IN, EXISTS), FROM (derived table), SELECT (scalar). Scalar, row, table subqueries.

CTE（Common Table Expression）.title: CTE (Common Table Expression)
CTE（Common Table Expression）.content: WITH name AS (SELECT ...). Multiple CTEs. Recursive CTE for hierarchies, number series.

第8週：ウィンドウ関数と高度な集計.title: Week 8: Window Functions and Advanced Aggregation

ウィンドウ関数の基本.title: Window Functions Basics
ウィンドウ関数の基本.content: ROW_NUMBER, RANK, DENSE_RANK. OVER (ORDER BY), PARTITION BY. Top-N per group.

LEAD、LAG、集計ウィンドウ.title: LEAD, LAG, Aggregate Windows
LEAD、LAG、集計ウィンドウ.content: LEAD/LAG for next/prev row. SUM/AVG OVER. ROWS BETWEEN. FIRST_VALUE, LAST_VALUE.

第9週：トランザクションとインデックス.title: Week 9: Transactions and Indexes
第9週：トランザクションとインデックス.description: ACID properties, COMMIT/ROLLBACK, index creation and optimization

トランザクション.title: Transactions
トランザクション.content: START TRANSACTION, COMMIT, ROLLBACK. SAVEPOINT. Isolation levels.

インデックス.title: Indexes
インデックス.content: CREATE INDEX, UNIQUE, FULLTEXT. SHOW INDEX. EXPLAIN. When to use indexes.

クエリ最適化のヒント.title: Query Optimization Tips
クエリ最適化のヒント.content: Avoid SELECT *. Use indexed columns in WHERE. LIMIT. EXISTS vs JOIN. EXPLAIN.

データベース正規化.title: Database Normalization
データベース正規化.content: 1NF: no repeating groups. 2NF: no partial dependency. 3NF: no transitive dependency. Trade-offs.

制約（Constraints）.title: Constraints
制約（Constraints）.content: PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, UNIQUE, CHECK, NOT NULL, DEFAULT. ON DELETE/UPDATE.

VIEW（ビュー）.title: VIEW
VIEW（ビュー）.content: CREATE VIEW, CREATE OR REPLACE, DROP. Updatable views. SHOW CREATE VIEW.

STORED PROCEDURE（ストアドプロシージャ）.title: Stored Procedure
STORED PROCEDURE（ストアドプロシージャ）.content: CREATE PROCEDURE, IN/OUT params. CALL. Cursor, LOOP, conditional logic.

TRIGGER（トリガー）.title: TRIGGER
TRIGGER（トリガー）.content: BEFORE/AFTER INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE. NEW, OLD. Audit log, validation.

SQLベストプラクティス.title: SQL Best Practices
SQLベストプラクティス.content: Naming, types, indexes, SELECT*, prepared statements, transactions, backup.
